summary: An ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, widening, extending and establishing of West 59th Street, from 1st Avenue Northwest to 3rd Avenue Northwest; of 2nd Avenue Northwest, from West 59th Street as extended herein to the south line of Tract 32, Ballard Acre Tracts, all in the City of Seattle, providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor and providing that the cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law.
